sentences.sContent: Use a minimum of ordinate and abscissa values so they do not run together.
sentences.sContent_eng: Use a minimum of ordinate and abscissa values so they do not run together.
sentences.sCn: 使用最低限度的协调与横坐标值使他们不跑在一起。

sentences.sContent: It helps co - ordinate the different parts of our bodies when we have sports.
sentences.sContent_eng: It helps co - ordinate the different parts of our bodies when we have sports.
sentences.sCn: 它帮助公司——纵坐标的不同部分我们的身体当我们有运动。

sentences.sContent: Drag onto the page, then drag one line end to ordinate origin and one to the feature.
sentences.sContent_eng: Drag onto the page, then drag one line end to ordinate origin and one to the feature.
sentences.sCn: 拖到绘图页上，然后将一个线端拖到坐标原点，一个线端拖到部件。

remMethod.val: ordin(顺序) + ate → 使数字按纵向顺序排列 → 纵坐标

words.tran: 分类；任命；神职授任；排成等级

trans.tranOther: the vertical or y-coordinate of a point in a two-dimensional system of Cartesian coordinates
